poem:
### The Ineffable  
In the silence, I seek  
The shadowed corner of meaning,  
Where words falter, and  
The heart grasps for God.  
A flicker of presence, unseen,  
Yet it burns, a profound  
Inferno within the soul,  
While the world turns, indifferent,  
But I am not untouched,  
For an invisible flame  
Leaves its mark on skin.
